response.original_title: Charlie Hustle: Blueprint of a Self-Made Millionare
response.overview: Fellow West Coast rappers C-Bo, Yukmouth, Fat Joe, and Jayo Felony guest star on what amounts to a semi-autobiographical accounting of E-40's own ascent from the ghetto to the California suburbs. All in all, this is a furious and energetic release of truths, guts, and the triumph of the American Dream.
response.title: Charlie Hustle: Blueprint of a Self-Made Millionare
